meanings.definition: A traditional Polynesian garment worn as a skirt or dress.
meanings.sent1: She danced gracefully in her colorful lavalavas.
meanings.sent2: The women at the festival wore beautiful lavalavas.
meanings.sent3: The lavalavas twirled as she spun around in excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her lavalavas was a vibrant rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the lavalavas swayed in the gentle breeze.

meanings.sent1: In the shop, they displayed various lavalavas for sale.
meanings.sent2: The dancers changed into their bright lavalavas backstage.
meanings.sent3: The lavalavas piled up in the laundry basket after the party.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the scent of freshly washed lavalavas.
meanings.sent5: The colorful lavalavas added a festive touch to the celebration.
